Date: Monday, 6/23/1990
Subject: Kent Anderson healing process
Kent Anderson is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 7/24/1990
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Rick Camp

Subject: Masayuki Kakefu is sick...

He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 1-2 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Friday, 8/8/1990
Subject: Luis DeLeon injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Swollen Eye.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Steve Lombardozzi Sr



Date: Saturday, 8/16/1990
Subject: Progress of John Cummings
Dear Sir,
John Cummings has an ERA of 3.96 at A Winter Haven Red Sox!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
